TEXT.P: A dose-response curve means different things depending on the nature of the study. The curve could represent the proportion of individuals exhibiting the desired response to a medicine. Or it could mean the proportion of test animals developing cancer tumors in response to an environmental contaminant.
Answer questions 8 through 10 in the assignment using this curve. The vertical bar slides left and right to help you identify the dose associated with a particular percentage response.
When you have answered these questions, you will have completed this activity.
